mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dev_game_statistics (id, game_id, view_count, download_count, rating, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{gameId}, #{viewCount}, #{downloadCount}, #{rating}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE dev_game_statistics SET view_count = view_count + #{viewIncrement}, download_count = download_count + #{downloadIncrement}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE game_id = #{gameId}
